name: WhatsApp Icons Vectorizing - pt.1
description:
As someone who is new to dogma, I decided to design these WhatsApp icons to get myself familiar with the tools.


It was a bit challenging not having access to some of the adobe illustrator tools I'm used to. Nonetheless, finding workarounds helped me get conversant with the dogma tools which are capable of a lot.


Switch to the “Behind the Scenes” page to get a glimpse of the process.


If it helps you in anyway, I'd appreciate your feedback in order to continue to improve.


Enjoy the icons!
